title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Electronic
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Electronic 

Communications Code) (Amendment) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (electronic communication code) (amendment) regulation 2024

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: 2. The European Union (Electronic Communications Code) Regulations
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Electronic Communications Code) Regulations 

2022 (S.I. No. 444 of 2022) are amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 2(1) by the insertion of the following definition 
after “Act of 2009”: 

“‘Act of 2022’ means the Consumer Rights Act 2022 (No. 37 of 
2022);” 

(b) 

in Regulation 2(1) by the substitution of the definition of “durable 
medium” for the following: 

“‘durable medium’ has the same meaning as in section 2(1) of the 
Act of 2022;” 

(c) 

in Regulation 87 by the substitution of the following for 
paragraph (1): 

“(1) Before a consumer is bound by a contract or any 
corresponding offer, a provider of publicly available electronic 
communications services, other than transmission services used 
for the provision of machine-to-machine services, shall provide 
the consumer with the information referred to in section 101, 103 
or 106 of the Act of 2022 as the case may be, and, in addition the 
information listed in Schedule 7, to the extent that the information 
relates to a service the provider provides.” 

1 OJ L 321, 17.12.2018, p. 36 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [529] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 
7 October, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [529]

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Electronic Communications 
Code) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 444 of 2022) to replace references to the 
European Union (Consumer Information, Cancellation and Other Rights) 
Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 484 of 2013) with references to the Consumer Rights 
Act 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [529] 5
